page.title: 09PETE TYE COMMON
page.content:
On the south side of the village of {Abberton}lies{Pete Tye Common.
The{Common}is used for lots of things like flying kites and planes. Sometimes the school plays games on it.Up until three years ago the school had its sports day there.There are oak and willow trees and a pond in the middle.In the summer the farmers cut the grass for hay. We are lucky because the common is so close to us,and we can see the fields.You are not allowed to build houses on common land.
The{Common}was originally part of the land belonging to the{manor of Pete.
